thread.title: Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text: I ordered a duvet cover. I then cancelled the order because it would take too long to get. I was told via email that my paypal would be credited within a day or two. A week later still no refund. I messaged them and they said it had been "credited to my account" and I had to select withdraw in my account. I tried to do that and there was no withdraw button. Then it told me my email was not recognized in there system. After about 20 minutes of navigating through their site I saw where I could submit a complaint to the supervisor. I tried about 10 times and it kept telling me it can't submit the review. I've never seen such complicated customer service in my life. Now I'm just frustrated and angry.
